definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: The one-dimensional atmospheric model can't be solved with a page of mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 一維模型是不能用一頁紙的計算就找出答案的。

sentences.english: It is always better to keep the design simple and use single-dimensional arrays.
sentences.chinese: 保持簡單的設計和使用一維數組總是更好的做法。

sentences.english: One-dimensional normal cloud is a very important cloud model with general applicability.
sentences.chinese: 一維正態雲是一種非常重要並且具有普適性的雲模型。

sentences.english: The 1-dimensional array of logical blocks is mapped into the sectors of the disk sequentially.
sentences.chinese: 邏輯塊的一維數組映射到磁盤上一些相連的扇區。

sentences.english: This paper is to study how the lengths of foundation piles influencing driven piles by one dimensional wave equation.
sentences.chinese: 應用一維波波動方程式探討基樁長度對打擊樁的影響。

sentences.english: In this paper, a simple one-dimensional transitive element is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 本文建議了一種簡單的一維過渡單元。

sentences.english: The one-dimensional model of Lurgi tude-shell type methanol synthesis reactor has been established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了魯奇式甲醇合成塔完整的雙速率一維模型。

sentences.english: The image segmentation method based on the maximum entropy of the one-dimensional bound histogram(ODBH) is also used.
sentences.chinese: 同時，也使用一維屬性直方圖的最大熵分割法。

sentences.english: Binary source data must be a single-dimensioned array of unsigned char.
sentences.chinese: 二進制源數據必須是一維的無符號字符數組。

sentences.english: An intensive discussion is presented of the four-dimensional description for one-dimensionally modulated structures.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一維調製結構的四維空間描述方法。

sentences.english: Two new methods for solving the problem of one dimensional square well are presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出兩種數值求解一維方勢阱問題的新方法。

sentences.english: As a result, many users extract one-dimensional (l-D) data from 3-D point clouds.
sentences.chinese: 因此，許多用戶從三維點雲數據中提取一維數據。

sentences.english: Already in the 19th century, physicists moved on to a "one-dimensional" model.
sentences.chinese: 早在19世紀，物理學家就試圖建立一個一維模型。

sentences.english: In this paper, by using a model named symmetric cutting out, a necessary and sufficient condition for interval of search tending to zero is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了優選法中一維搜索區間趨於零的充要條件。

sentences.english: The vertical eigen-mode was solved by one-dimensional finite element method (FEM).
sentences.chinese: 垂直特徵模式用一維有限元計算。

sentences.english: The expression of one-dimensional wave function including the potential field function is presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了引入勢場函數的一維波函數的表達式。
